channel.title: Dragon
channel.description: Welcome to Sha Tin College Dragon’s Official Site.

item.title: Food Waste Audit
item.description:
“Hey Guys!
So the Environmental Council is going to arrange a food audit starting from next Monday and we need people who are willing to be food recycling monitors!
Basically we’re trying to gather information on the amount of food people in this school wastes everyday, so we can make graphs and do fancy stuff with it.
You get EAG points for being a monitor and for Y12/13, you get CAS minors if you do it for more than 1 break!!!!!!!
Basically, as a monitor, you just stand there in front of a food bin andd make sure people throw food waste

item.title: Swimming Gala
item.description:
“Good job guys! Thanks to everyone who cheered and swam! We deserved first place and it’s all down to you guys! You were the reason why we won swimming gala, and I want us to keep going and take that energy and house spirit into sports day! This is my last big event as student leader so thanks for making my last swimming gala an amazing one, and a successful one!”
-Mervyn McKinley, Head of House

item.title: Current Positions
item.description:
“YO GUYS WE’RE IN THE LEAD!! GOOD JOB EVERYBODY, let’s keep this going and win the spirit cup tomorrow! And we may as well go ahead and win gala as well while we’re at it!
-Kasia Cheng, Head of House

item.title: Mervyn's "Speech"
item.description:
“Hello my dragons...
We are currently in the lead for the house cup, it is a slim lead but we are ahead. OH MY GOOOOOOODDDDDNEEEESSS RIGHT?!
WE GOTTA KEEP THIS LEAD!!!!
Okay I want everyone in the stands tomorrow cheering and don’t walk away from our stands because we will hunt you down and drag you back into the stand where you belong.
To the competitors tomorrow, GOOD LUCK! I BELIEVE IN ALL OF YOU!!!
Okay so the new chant is this, PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU KNOW IT FOR TOMORROW!
Sink or swim,
Do or die,
Now’s the time to watch us fly.
Watch us soar,
Hear us roar,
We are Dragons and we’ll beat them all!
GOOOOOOO DRAGGOOOONNNNN”
-Mervyn McKinley, Head of House

item.title: Future Inter-House Competitions
item.description:
“Hi everybody!
If you are any good with cameras at all, it would be great if you could bring them along to gala and get pics & videos which could be used for the inter-house music video & yearbook! If you have footage/pics to contribute, message me after gala. Thanks guys!
Also, let’s go kick the other houses butts YEAH”
-Kasia Cheng - Head of House
